channel.title: Shop prices messed up
channel.description:
I've been looking rather thoroughly through my item.cfg, but I can't seem to find the problem, the problem is, when you try and get the shop price of the item, it just says 0, but when you try to buy it, you still need the amount of coins it was. I'm not sure how to fix this [code=java]item = 9748 Attack_cape_(t) The_cape_worn_by_masters_of_attack. 99000 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0[/code]
[code=java]shop = 11 Skillcape_Shop 1 1 9748 999999999[/code]
It shops a shop price in the code, but not ingame, can anyone help?
Thanks
